Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                  Whether you’re interested in advancing in your current profession, changing career paths, or acquiring expertise that will enable your business to grow, our noncredit courses and certificates in marketing and public relations can help you to establish your professional standing or ascend in the marketplace.   Our faculty of experts, the depth and convenience of our programming, and the diversity and dynamism of our students, make coursework and certificate study at the NYU School of Professional Studies a transformative experience.           Ready to Proceed?        Register for Courses Now                 Noncredit Courses        More than ever, it’s crucial to maintain your professional advantage by staying abreast of the cutting-edge trends and developments in your field. The NYU School of Professional Studies offers hundreds of learning opportunities that are designed to meet the needs of individuals who strive to excel and to lead in public relations, corporate communication, investor relations, and marketing. Faculty members develop and deliver course content that reflects the newest concepts and the latest strategies. Programs are available in a variety of convenient formats–day, evening, weekends, intensives, and online–to accommodate the busy schedules of working professionals.            A Selection of Courses From This Department                                              Business Intelligence: Concepts and Techniques I                                                            Emerging Topics in PR                                                            Digital Analytics II                                                            Marketing and Strategic Communications Writing I                                                            Public Relations: The Principles of the Practice                                                            Digital Marketing II                                                                               View all Marketing and Public Relations Noncredit Courses           Certificates        Earning a noncredit certificate through the NYU School of Professional Studies can be the pathway for you to gain the expertise, the industry-specific skills, and the self-confidence that can lead to your professional advancement, next career, or entrepreneurial business venture. Certificates can provide a transitional step prior to entering a graduate program or they can serve to complement an existing graduate degree with study in an additional area of specialization. There are several key public relations and marketing areas from which to choose. Courses are taught by highly qualified faculty members who have in-depth experience in their subject areas.                                   Certificate in Digital Analytics                                       Certificate in Digital Marketing                                       Certificate in Public Relations                                         Certificate in Integrated Communications                                       Certificate in Media Management                                              Ready to Proceed?
